general.description: Priscus was settled because of the rich soil being useful for cultivating a series of unusually durable plants that are useful in the growing process of Soromid ships. No one is quite sure how the plants are useful, only that the Soromid insist on tightly controlling this little farming world.
general.bar: The bar is crowded with exhausted farmers, government-mandated trading factors, or suspicious government officials. The service, while not stellar, is at least competent enough to not cause comment.
